short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surf Wikipedia on a specific date in the past.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When surfing Wikipedia, sometimes I want to see how articles looked like on a specific date in the past. With Wayback Wiki you can choose a specific date, and every Wikipedia article you visit will automatically redirect you to the version of the article that existed on that date.
